content: if this is your first doll using my patterns you might want to make more than 1 try and add an eyelash to size the result you can also make the embroidery for the eyes as explained below if it shouldn t be clear enough i d advise you to take a look at the video tutorial i ve published on instagram of course moana s eyes are brown the blue is used just as an example to let you show the process 8 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts ​ https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs keep stuffing while closing the head the head tip​ while stuffing the head it s possible that the must be stuffed firmly eyes will tilt towards the outside it s a good trick r44 2 single_crochet decrease x 6 18 to straighten them using some threads placed r45 1 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 inside the head you might place them afterwards r46 6 decrease 6 or prepare them while crocheting the head just in cy-po leaving a long tail for sewing using a case you might need it make them pass here tapestry needle pass the tail through all the fls of the last round and pull make a knot and hide the yarn inside the doll s body here s the result so far and then out on the back if you need to straighten the eyes simply pull these strings gently hair you can also embroider the nose and the eyebrows hook 3 0 work loosely start with dark brown yarn first work a long chain n​ ​ with brown yarn then starting from second loop from hook work ​ n-1 single_crochet in its loops n should be such that the strand reaches the doll s waist for me that
